MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY24 postcode area of Y Borth affecting properties in High Street, Bryngwyn Close and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:52AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12 Midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:05AM on 20th January 2021
